content:
The lie-flat bed was definitely the highlight of my business class experience with British Airways. It made a huge difference in my overall travel experience, and I felt so much more rested and refreshed when I arrived in London. The personalized service and high-quality food were also amazing, but the lie-flat bed was the real star of the show.

And, I'm happy to say that I redeemed miles for that business class ticket! I've been accumulating miles through my credit card and flying habits, and it was great to finally use them for a luxurious experience like that.
